title: Asset Industry Attribute Model
description: A set of attributes for Assets that describe specific properties of a real asset used in given industries e.g. transformers, bueses etc

name.description: This is the key of the custom attribute used for lookup

value.description: The actual value of the custom attributeas a JSON object

category.description: This is the optional category that the attribute may fit in e.g. from a particular system or of a particular type

dataType.description: This is the optional data type of the value which can be null or a reference to a model schema
